mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE( (SELECT SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, sh1.curr_time, sh2.curr_time)) FROM study_history sh1 JOIN study_history sh2 ON sh1.id = sh2.id - 1 WHERE sh1.user_id = #{userId} AND sh1.status = 0 AND sh2.status = 1 AND DATE(sh1.curr_time) = DATE(#{currTime}) AND DATE(sh2.curr_time) = DATE(#{currTime})), 0 ) AS total_seconds
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study_history (sort_method, problem_id, last_step, curr_time, status, user_id) VALUES (#{sortMethod}, #{problemId}, #{lastStep}, #{currTime}, #{status}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM study_history WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM study_history WHERE id = #{enterId}) AND sort_method = (SELECT sort_method FROM study_history WHERE id = #{enterId}) AND problem_id = (SELECT problem_id FROM study_history WHERE id = #{enterId}) AND status = 1 AND curr_time > (SELECT curr_time FROM study_history WHERE id = #{enterId}) ORDER BY curr_time ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM study_history sh1 WHERE sh1.user_id = #{userId} AND sh1.status = 1 AND sh1.curr_time = ( SELECT MAX(sh2.curr_time) FROM study_history sh2 WHERE sh2.user_id = #{userId} AND sh2.sort_method = sh1.sort_method AND sh2.problem_id = sh1.problem_id ) ORDER BY sh1.curr_time DESC
